name: Raster (Harre)
description:
If you watch my youtube channel (Getuh Lyfe), then you may know that I had another project called raster which was a platformer. I god rid of this project and decided to name this game raster instead. I made this game over a 48 hour period, and made a video about it which you can find here:

. I let the game sit for a couple weeks before adding a level editor. I never uploaded the video that I made until about a month after the level editor, and I made this project simply so that people interested can play it.

Speaking of the level editor... You can add every block in the main game into a level. You can save that level and can even load it (crazy I know). The file for this level is located in c:/user/appdata/local/grid/[here]. If you really wanted to go through the effort, you could even distribute your level files on the internet and have others import them into their folder to play.

Also, I am aware that this itch.io page is particularly lack-luster, it's 11:01 pm right now and I'm tired and don't feel like taking more screenshots.
